00027 /*
00028  * lustre/ptlrpc/nrs_crr.c
00029  *
00030  * Network Request Scheduler (NRS) CRR-N policy
00031  *
00032  * Request ordering in a batched Round-Robin manner over client NIDs
00033  *
00034  * Author: Liang Zhen <liang@whamcloud.com>
00035  * Author: Nikitas Angelinas <nikitas_angelinas@xyratex.com>
00036  */
00041 #ifdef HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT
00042 
00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC
00044 #include <obd_support.h>
00045 #include <obd_class.h>
00046 #include <lustre_net.h>
00047 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00048 #include "ptlrpc_internal.h"

00059 #define NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN       "crrn"
00060 
00075 static int
00076 crrn_req_compare(struct cfs_binheap_node *e1, struct cfs_binheap_node *e2)
00077 {
00078         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq1;
00079         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq2;
00080 
00081         nrq1 = container_of(e1, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request, nr_node);
00082         nrq2 = container_of(e2, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request, nr_node);
00083 
00084         if (nrq1->nr_u.crr.cr_round < nrq2->nr_u.crr.cr_round)
00085                 return 1;
00086         else if (nrq1->nr_u.crr.cr_round > nrq2->nr_u.crr.cr_round)
00087                 return 0;
00088 
00089         return nrq1->nr_u.crr.cr_sequence < nrq2->nr_u.crr.cr_sequence;
00090 }
00091 
00092 static struct cfs_binheap_ops nrs_crrn_heap_ops = {
00093         .hop_enter      = NULL,
00094         .hop_exit       = NULL,
00095         .hop_compare    = crrn_req_compare,
00096 };

00104 #define NRS_NID_BKT_BITS        8
00105 #define NRS_NID_BITS            16
00106 
00107 static unsigned nrs_crrn_hop_hash(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00108                                   unsigned mask)
00109 {
00110         return cfs_hash_djb2_hash(key, sizeof(lnet_nid_t), mask);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static int nrs_crrn_hop_keycmp(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00114 {
00115         lnet_nid_t              *nid = (lnet_nid_t *)key;
00116         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00117                                                        struct nrs_crrn_client,
00118                                                        cc_hnode);
00119         return *nid == cli->cc_nid;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void *nrs_crrn_hop_key(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00123 {
00124         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00125                                                        struct nrs_crrn_client,
00126                                                        cc_hnode);
00127         return &cli->cc_nid;
00128 }
00129 
00130 static void *nrs_crrn_hop_object(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00131 {
00132         return hlist_entry(hnode, struct nrs_crrn_client, cc_hnode);
00133 }
00134 
00135 static void nrs_crrn_hop_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00136 {
00137         struct nrs_crrn_client *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00138                                                       struct nrs_crrn_client,
00139                                                       cc_hnode);
00140         atomic_inc(&cli->cc_ref);
00141 }
00142 
00143 static void nrs_crrn_hop_put(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00144 {
00145         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00146                                                        struct nrs_crrn_client,
00147                                                        cc_hnode);
00148         atomic_dec(&cli->cc_ref);
00149 }
00150 
00151 static void nrs_crrn_hop_exit(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00152 {
00153         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli = hlist_entry(hnode,
00154                                                        struct nrs_crrn_client,
00155                                                        cc_hnode);
00156         LASSERTF(atomic_read(&cli->cc_ref) == 0,
00157                  "Busy CRR-N object from client with NID %s, with %d refs\n",
00158                  libcfs_nid2str(cli->cc_nid), atomic_read(&cli->cc_ref));
00159 
00160         OBD_FREE_PTR(cli);
00161 }
00162 
00163 static struct cfs_hash_ops nrs_crrn_hash_ops = {
00164         .hs_hash        = nrs_crrn_hop_hash,
00165         .hs_keycmp      = nrs_crrn_hop_keycmp,
00166         .hs_key         = nrs_crrn_hop_key,
00167         .hs_object      = nrs_crrn_hop_object,
00168         .hs_get         = nrs_crrn_hop_get,
00169         .hs_put         = nrs_crrn_hop_put,
00170         .hs_put_locked  = nrs_crrn_hop_put,
00171         .hs_exit        = nrs_crrn_hop_exit,
00172 };
00173 
00182 static int nrs_crrn_start(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy, char *arg)
00183 {
00184         struct nrs_crrn_net    *net;
00185         int                     rc = 0;
00186         ENTRY;
00187 
00188         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_PTR(net, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
00189         if (net == NULL)
00190                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00191 
00192         net->cn_binheap = cfs_binheap_create(&nrs_crrn_heap_ops,
00193                                              CBH_FLAG_ATOMIC_GROW, 4096, NULL,
00194                                              nrs_pol2cptab(policy),
00195                                              nrs_pol2cptid(policy));
00196         if (net->cn_binheap == NULL)
00197                 GOTO(failed, rc = -ENOMEM);
00198 
00199         net->cn_cli_hash = cfs_hash_create("nrs_crrn_nid_hash",
00200                                            NRS_NID_BITS, NRS_NID_BITS,
00201                                            NRS_NID_BKT_BITS, 0,
00202                                            CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00203                                            CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00204                                            &nrs_crrn_hash_ops,
00205                                            CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK);
00206         if (net->cn_cli_hash == NULL)
00207                 GOTO(failed, rc = -ENOMEM);
00208 
00215         net->cn_quantum = OBD_MAX_RIF_DEFAULT;
00220         net->cn_sequence = 1;
00221 
00222         policy->pol_private = net;
00223 
00224         RETURN(rc);
00225 
00226 failed:
00227         if (net->cn_binheap != NULL)
00228                 cfs_binheap_destroy(net->cn_binheap);
00229 
00230         OBD_FREE_PTR(net);
00231 
00232         RETURN(rc);
00233 }
00234 
00244 static void nrs_crrn_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00245 {
00246         struct nrs_crrn_net     *net = policy->pol_private;
00247         ENTRY;
00248 
00249         LASSERT(net != NULL);
00250         LASSERT(net->cn_binheap != NULL);
00251         LASSERT(net->cn_cli_hash != NULL);
00252         LASSERT(cfs_binheap_is_empty(net->cn_binheap));
00253 
00254         cfs_binheap_destroy(net->cn_binheap);
00255         cfs_hash_putref(net->cn_cli_hash);
00256 
00257         OBD_FREE_PTR(net);
00258 }
00259 
00274 static int nrs_crrn_ctl(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00275                         enum ptlrpc_nrs_ctl opc,
00276                         void *arg)
00277 {
00278         assert_spin_locked(&policy->pol_nrs->nrs_lock);
00279 
00280         switch((enum nrs_ctl_crr)opc) {
00281         default:
00282                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00283 
00287         case NRS_CTL_CRRN_RD_QUANTUM: {
00288                 struct nrs_crrn_net     *net = policy->pol_private;
00289 
00290                 *(__u16 *)arg = net->cn_quantum;
00291                 }
00292                 break;
00293 
00297         case NRS_CTL_CRRN_WR_QUANTUM: {
00298                 struct nrs_crrn_net     *net = policy->pol_private;
00299 
00300                 net->cn_quantum = *(__u16 *)arg;
00301                 LASSERT(net->cn_quantum != 0);
00302                 }
00303                 break;
00304         }
00305 
00306         RETURN(0);
00307 }
00308 
00331 static int nrs_crrn_res_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00332                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq,
00333                             const struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *parent,
00334                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource **resp, bool moving_req)
00335 {
00336         struct nrs_crrn_net     *net;
00337         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli;
00338         struct nrs_crrn_client  *tmp;
00339         struct ptlrpc_request   *req;
00340 
00341         if (parent == NULL) {
00342                 *resp = &((struct nrs_crrn_net *)policy->pol_private)->cn_res;
00343                 return 0;
00344         }
00345 
00346         net = container_of(parent, struct nrs_crrn_net, cn_res);
00347         req = container_of(nrq, struct ptlrpc_request, rq_nrq);
00348 
00349         cli = cfs_hash_lookup(net->cn_cli_hash, &req->rq_peer.nid);
00350         if (cli != NULL)
00351                 goto out;
00352 
00353         OBD_CPT_ALLOC_GFP(cli, nrs_pol2cptab(policy), nrs_pol2cptid(policy),
00354                           sizeof(*cli), moving_req ? GFP_ATOMIC : GFP_NOFS);
00355         if (cli == NULL)
00356                 return -ENOMEM;
00357 
00358         cli->cc_nid = req->rq_peer.nid;
00359 
00360         atomic_set(&cli->cc_ref, 1);
00361         tmp = cfs_hash_findadd_unique(net->cn_cli_hash, &cli->cc_nid,
00362                                       &cli->cc_hnode);
00363         if (tmp != cli) {
00364                 OBD_FREE_PTR(cli);
00365                 cli = tmp;
00366         }
00367 out:
00368         *resp = &cli->cc_res;
00369 
00370         return 1;
00371 }
00372 
00380 static void nrs_crrn_res_put(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00381                              const struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *res)
00382 {
00383         struct nrs_crrn_net     *net;
00384         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli;
00385 
00389         if (res->res_parent == NULL)
00390                 return;
00391 
00392         cli = container_of(res, struct nrs_crrn_client, cc_res);
00393         net = container_of(res->res_parent, struct nrs_crrn_net, cn_res);
00394 
00395         cfs_hash_put(net->cn_cli_hash, &cli->cc_hnode);
00396 }
00397 
00413 static
00414 struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrs_crrn_req_get(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00415                                             bool peek, bool force)
00416 {
00417         struct nrs_crrn_net       *net = policy->pol_private;
00418         struct cfs_binheap_node   *node = cfs_binheap_root(net->cn_binheap);
00419         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq;
00420 
00421         nrq = unlikely(node == NULL) ? NULL :
00422               container_of(node, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request, nr_node);
00423 
00424         if (likely(!peek && nrq != NULL)) {
00425                 struct nrs_crrn_client *cli;
00426                 struct ptlrpc_request *req = container_of(nrq,
00427                                                           struct ptlrpc_request,
00428                                                           rq_nrq);
00429 
00430                 cli = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq),
00431                                    struct nrs_crrn_client, cc_res);
00432 
00433                 LASSERT(nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round <= cli->cc_round);
00434 
00435                 cfs_binheap_remove(net->cn_binheap, &nrq->nr_node);
00436                 cli->cc_active--;
00437 
00438                 CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE,
00439                        "NRS: starting to handle %s request from %s, with round "
00440                        LPU64"\n", NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00441                        libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer), nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round);
00442 
00444                 node = cfs_binheap_root(net->cn_binheap);
00445 
00447                 if (unlikely(node == NULL)) {
00448                         net->cn_round++;
00449                 } else {
00450                         struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *next;
00451 
00452                         next = container_of(node, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request,
00453                                             nr_node);
00454 
00455                         if (net->cn_round < next->nr_u.crr.cr_round)
00456                                 net->cn_round = next->nr_u.crr.cr_round;
00457                 }
00458         }
00459 
00460         return nrq;
00461 }
00462 
00492 static int nrs_crrn_req_add(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00493                             struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00494 {
00495         struct nrs_crrn_net     *net;
00496         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli;
00497         int                      rc;
00498 
00499         cli = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq),
00500                            struct nrs_crrn_client, cc_res);
00501         net = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq)->res_parent,
00502                            struct nrs_crrn_net, cn_res);
00503 
00504         if (cli->cc_quantum == 0 || cli->cc_round < net->cn_round ||
00505             (cli->cc_active == 0 && cli->cc_quantum > 0)) {
00506 
00517                 if (cli->cc_active == 0 && cli->cc_quantum > 0)
00518                         cli->cc_round++;
00519 
00521                 if (cli->cc_round < net->cn_round)
00522                         cli->cc_round = net->cn_round;
00523 
00525                 if (cli->cc_sequence < net->cn_sequence)
00526                         cli->cc_sequence = ++net->cn_sequence;
00533                 cli->cc_quantum = net->cn_quantum;
00534         }
00535 
00536         nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round = cli->cc_round;
00537         nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_sequence = cli->cc_sequence;
00538 
00539         rc = cfs_binheap_insert(net->cn_binheap, &nrq->nr_node);
00540         if (rc == 0) {
00541                 cli->cc_active++;
00542                 if (--cli->cc_quantum == 0)
00543                         cli->cc_round++;
00544         }
00545         return rc;
00546 }
00547 
00555 static void nrs_crrn_req_del(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00556                              struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00557 {
00558         struct nrs_crrn_net     *net;
00559         struct nrs_crrn_client  *cli;
00560         bool                     is_root;
00561 
00562         cli = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq),
00563                            struct nrs_crrn_client, cc_res);
00564         net = container_of(nrs_request_resource(nrq)->res_parent,
00565                            struct nrs_crrn_net, cn_res);
00566 
00567         LASSERT(nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round <= cli->cc_round);
00568 
00569         is_root = &nrq->nr_node == cfs_binheap_root(net->cn_binheap);
00570 
00571         cfs_binheap_remove(net->cn_binheap, &nrq->nr_node);
00572         cli->cc_active--;
00573 
00578         if (unlikely(is_root)) {
00580                 struct cfs_binheap_node *node = cfs_binheap_root(net->cn_binheap);
00581 
00583                 if (unlikely(node == NULL)) {
00584                         net->cn_round++;
00585                 } else {
00586                         nrq = container_of(node, struct ptlrpc_nrs_request,
00587                                            nr_node);
00588 
00589                         if (net->cn_round < nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round)
00590                                 net->cn_round = nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round;
00591                 }
00592         }
00593 }
00594 
00602 static void nrs_crrn_req_stop(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy,
00603                               struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00604 {
00605         struct ptlrpc_request *req = container_of(nrq, struct ptlrpc_request,
00606                                                   rq_nrq);
00607 
00608         CDEBUG(D_RPCTRACE,
00609                "NRS: finished handling %s request from %s, with round "LPU64
00610                "\n", NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00611                libcfs_id2str(req->rq_peer), nrq->nr_u.crr.cr_round);
00612 }

00614 #ifdef CONFIG_PROC_FS

00634 static int
00635 ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_crrn_quantum_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00636 {
00637         struct ptlrpc_service   *svc = m->private;
00638         __u16                   quantum;
00639         int                     rc;
00640 
00646         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG,
00647                                        NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00648                                        NRS_CTL_CRRN_RD_QUANTUM,
00649                                        true, &quantum);
00650         if (rc == 0) {
00651                 seq_printf(m, NRS_LPROCFS_QUANTUM_NAME_REG
00652                            "%-5d\n", quantum);
00657         } else if (rc != -ENODEV) {
00658                 return rc;
00659         }
00660 
00661         if (!nrs_svc_has_hp(svc))
00662                 goto no_hp;
00663 
00664         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP,
00665                                        NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00666                                        NRS_CTL_CRRN_RD_QUANTUM,
00667                                        true, &quantum);
00668         if (rc == 0) {
00669                 seq_printf(m, NRS_LPROCFS_QUANTUM_NAME_HP"%-5d\n", quantum);
00674         } else if (rc != -ENODEV) {
00675                 return rc;
00676         }
00677 
00678 no_hp:
00679         return rc;
00680 }
00681 
00702 static ssize_t
00703 ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_crrn_quantum_seq_write(struct file *file,
00704                                           const char __user *buffer,
00705                                           size_t count,
00706                                           loff_t *off)
00707 {
00708         struct ptlrpc_service       *svc = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00709         enum ptlrpc_nrs_queue_type   queue = 0;
00710         char                         kernbuf[LPROCFS_NRS_WR_QUANTUM_MAX_CMD];
00711         char                        *val;
00712         long                         quantum_reg;
00713         long                         quantum_hp;
00715         size_t                       count_copy;
00716         int                          rc = 0;
00717         int                          rc2 = 0;
00718 
00719         if (count > (sizeof(kernbuf) - 1))
00720                 return -EINVAL;
00721 
00722         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00723                 return -EFAULT;
00724 
00725         kernbuf[count] = '\0';
00726 
00727         count_copy = count;
00728 
00732         val = lprocfs_find_named_value(kernbuf, NRS_LPROCFS_QUANTUM_NAME_REG,
00733                                        &count_copy);
00734         if (val != kernbuf) {
00735                 quantum_reg = simple_strtol(val, NULL, 10);
00736 
00737                 queue |= PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG;
00738         }
00739 
00740         count_copy = count;
00741 
00745         val = lprocfs_find_named_value(kernbuf, NRS_LPROCFS_QUANTUM_NAME_HP,
00746                                        &count_copy);
00747         if (val != kernbuf) {
00748                 if (!nrs_svc_has_hp(svc))
00749                         return -ENODEV;
00750 
00751                 quantum_hp = simple_strtol(val, NULL, 10);
00752 
00753                 queue |= PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP;
00754         }
00755 
00760         if (queue == 0) {
00761                 if (!isdigit(kernbuf[0]))
00762                         return -EINVAL;
00763 
00764                 quantum_reg = simple_strtol(kernbuf, NULL, 10);
00765 
00766                 queue = PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG;
00767 
00768                 if (nrs_svc_has_hp(svc)) {
00769                         queue |= PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP;
00770                         quantum_hp = quantum_reg;
00771                 }
00772         }
00773 
00774         if ((((queue & PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG) != 0) &&
00775             ((quantum_reg > LPROCFS_NRS_QUANTUM_MAX || quantum_reg <= 0))) ||
00776             (((queue & PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP) != 0) &&
00777             ((quantum_hp > LPROCFS_NRS_QUANTUM_MAX || quantum_hp <= 0))))
00778                 return -EINVAL;
00779 
00790         if ((queue & PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG) != 0) {
00791                 rc = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG,
00792                                                NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00793                                                NRS_CTL_CRRN_WR_QUANTUM, false,
00794                                                &quantum_reg);
00795                 if ((rc < 0 && rc != -ENODEV) ||
00796                     (rc == -ENODEV && queue == PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_REG))
00797                         return rc;
00798         }
00799 
00800         if ((queue & PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP) != 0) {
00801                 rc2 = ptlrpc_nrs_policy_control(svc, PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP,
00802                                                 NRS_POL_NAME_CRRN,
00803                                                 NRS_CTL_CRRN_WR_QUANTUM, false,
00804                                                 &quantum_hp);
00805                 if ((rc2 < 0 && rc2 != -ENODEV) ||
00806                     (rc2 == -ENODEV && queue == PTLRPC_NRS_QUEUE_HP))
00807                         return rc2;
00808         }
00809 
00810         return rc == -ENODEV && rc2 == -ENODEV ? -ENODEV : count;
00811 }
00812 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_crrn_quantum);
00813 
00822 static int nrs_crrn_lprocfs_init(struct ptlrpc_service *svc)
00823 {
00824         struct lprocfs_vars nrs_crrn_lprocfs_vars[] = {
00825                 { .name         = "nrs_crrn_quantum",
00826                   .fops         = &ptlrpc_lprocfs_nrs_crrn_quantum_fops,
00827                   .data = svc },
00828                 { NULL }
00829         };
00830 
00831         if (svc->srv_procroot == NULL)
00832                 return 0;
00833 
00834         return lprocfs_add_vars(svc->srv_procroot, nrs_crrn_lprocfs_vars, NULL);
00835 }
00836 
00842 static void nrs_crrn_lprocfs_fini(struct ptlrpc_service *svc)
00843 {
00844         if (svc->srv_procroot == NULL)
00845                 return;
00846 
00847         lprocfs_remove_proc_entry("nrs_crrn_quantum", svc->srv_procroot);
00848 }

00851 
00855 static const struct ptlrpc_nrs_pol_ops nrs_crrn_ops = {
